EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Favor
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain the Magical Training Feat.
Each core ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to Spell DCs +15 Maximum Hit Points +25 Maximum Spell Points +5 Ranged Power +5 Force and Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Vision
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks have Ghost Touch and you bypass 5% Dodge and Fortification. If you have the Holy Strike feat, double the Dodge and Fortification bypass.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Audience with the Queen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Get some tea! When you rest at a shrine, you pop off for some tea, and randomly get a beneficial effect based on the type of tea you receive. These effects last for 10 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Countenance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1 to Saving Throws vs. Spells, with an additional +1 for every Favored Enemy feat you've acquired. +1 Maximum Manyshot charges.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Prism
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle: Your ranged and thrown attacks have a 15% chance to deal 7d77 extra damage of a random type, scaling with 200% Ranged Power. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 7d77 extra damage of a random type, scaling with that type's Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Shiradi Destiny Mantle
Stance.Description: Shiradi Destiny Mantle: Your ranged and thrown attacks have a 15% chance to deal 7d77 + 1d77 per 7 Imbue Dice extra damage of a random type scaling with 200% Ranged Power. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to deal 7d77 + 1d77 per 7 Imbue Dice extra damage of a random type, scaling with that type's Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Wild Magics
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/100] Maximum Spell Points. Rank 3: +5 Force and Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Good Luck
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Luck bonus to all Saving Throws and Skills. If you have the Luck of Heroes feat, double this bonus.

Effect.DisplayName: Shiradi Champion: Good Luck and Luck of Heroes
Shiradi Champion: Good Luck and Luck of Heroes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Shiradi Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Ranged or Caster Epic Strike.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Lights
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Enemies in a cone take 1d6+3 Force damage per caster level and must make a save DC (20 + Max(INT, WIS,CHA) + Illusion bonuses) versus Will, Fortitude, and Reflex for a Daze, Blind, and Silence effect. Cooldown: 6 seconds. Cost: 10 Spell Points.
If you have the Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle abilities Stay Good, Stay Loud, or Stay Toxic, this ability's damage changes to match your selected damage type.
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Pin
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals +30% Damage Cooldown: 15 seconds Epic Strike: AOE Ranged Attack: Make a Single Shot Ranged Attack that shatters on impact, hitting all enemies in a small area around where it lands. If a moving enemy is affected, they are slowed for 12 seconds.
Every Epic Strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fey Sight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Listen, Search, and Spot. Rank 3: You are immune to Blindness.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Stay
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Pick a Secondary Element.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stay Good
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle, your attacks have a 15% chance to deal [1/2/3]d77 extra Light damage. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to proc this damage. This Light damage scales with 200% Ranged Power if from a Ranged attack, or 100% Light Spell Power if from a spell. Rank 3: Enemies hit by your ranged attacks have a 20% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds. Enemies hit by your offensive spells have a 30% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stay Loud
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle, your attacks have a 15% chance to deal [1/2/3]d77 extra Sonic damage. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to proc this damage. This Sonic damage scales with 200% Ranged Power if from a Ranged attack, or 100% Sonic Spell Power if from a spell. Rank 3: Enemies hit by your ranged attacks have a 20% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds. Enemies hit by your offensive spells have a 30% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stay Strong
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle, your attacks have a 15% chance to deal [1/2/3]d77 extra Force damage. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to proc this damage. This Force damage scales with 200% Ranged Power if from a Ranged attack, or 100% Force Spell Power if from a spell. Rank 3: Enemies hit by your ranged attacks have a 20% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds. Enemies hit by your offensive spells have a 30% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stay Toxic
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in your Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle, your attacks have a 15% chance to deal [1/2/3]d77 extra Poison damage. Your offensive spells have a 7% chance to proc this damage. This Poison damage scales with 200% Ranged Power if from a Ranged attack, or 100% Poison Spell Power if from a spell. Rank 3: Enemies hit by your ranged attacks have a 20% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds. Enemies hit by your offensive spells have a 30% chance to be blinded for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Fade or Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select between Doubleshot and defensive ability.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Presence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[2/4/6]% Incorporeality

EnhancementSelection.Name: Phase Double
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[2/4/6] Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Friend or Foe
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Embrace your Fey nature or reject it.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enemy Of My Own
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the Favored Enemy: Fey feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Form
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain DR 10/Cold Iron, +5 Force and Universal Spell Power, and your main hand weapon becomes an Implement.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Healing Spring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Casts Greater Vigor on multiple targets. A positive energy conjuration that heals 1d8, +1 per 3 caster levels (max +13 at level 39), every 2 seconds for 8 seconds. When the initial effect expires, a smaller healing effect hat heals 1 HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds is applied. Cooldown: 30 Seconds. Cost: 1 Wild Empathy Charge.
Only one Vigor spell can be active at a time, with the most beneficial taking priority. If multiple Vigor spells are cast on the same target, then the duration is extended. Passive: +1 Wild Empathy Charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Empathetic Link
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] charges of Wild Empathy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Double Rainbow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle, your ranged and offensive spells have a 7% chance to inflict a random effect on your target. These effects scale with various different things depending on their origins, including Melee, Ranged, and Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Pierce Deception
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain the Watchful Eye feat, or, if you have it already, you gain +5% Doubleshot.

Effect.DisplayName: Shiradi Champion: Pierce Deception / Watchful Eye

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Beguile or Hunt's End
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a special ability.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Beguiling Charm
EnhancementSelection.Description: Target must make a Will save versus DC (20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA + Enchantment bonuses) or be Charmed for 12 seconds. While under this Charm, they deal double damage. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Cost: 10 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hunt's End
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals +250% Damage +20 Critical Threat Range
Ranged Attack: End the hunt with a single, decisive shot. Cooldown: 9 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Strike Upgrade I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Upgrade Pin or Fey Lights

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Flash
EnhancementSelection.Description: Fey Flash: Fey Lights now additionally affects Undead, Plants, Constructs, and Oozes, who would normally be immune to such effects.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Queen's Diplomacy
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +30% Damage If enemies hit by Pin are not moving, they are Immobilized for 6 seconds. If enemies hit by Pin are moving, they Dance for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Shiradi Champion Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to enhance.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Conjuration Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchantment
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Enchantment Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Illusion
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Illusion Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Transmutation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Transmutation Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Cruelty of the Hunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle, you deal +10% damage against Helpless opponents.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Track
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Dealing damage to enemies with spells or ranged attacks reduces their Saving Throws and Armor Class by 1 and Fortification by 2%. Stacks 10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Countenance of Queens
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You generate -30% less Threat from all sources.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Strike Upgrade II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Upgrade Pin or Fey Lights

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fey Flare
EnhancementSelection.Description: The Daze portion of Fey Lights is now a Stun instead.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Overwhelming Force
EnhancementSelection.Description: Pin now automatically applies 10 stacks of Track to enemies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Crooked Touch
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between attack speed or Imbue dice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flickering Fingers
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Imbue dice

EnhancementSelection.Name: Whirling Wrists
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[10/20/30]% Attack Speed with Thrown Weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Nerve Venom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in your Shiradi Champion Destiny Mantle, your ranged attacks and offensive spells have a 7% chance to paralyze living creatures for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Control
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Lore of the Hunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Weapons gain +1 Critical Damage Multiplier on rolls of 19-20.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Feywild Attunement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Every 4 Wilderness Lore feats grant you +1% Dodge.
You are always considered to be in Point Blank Shot range.
You have Base Attack Bonus equal to your Character Level.
+10 Force and Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shiradi Champion: Epic Moment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Epic Moment.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Inexorable Advance
EnhancementSelection.Description: Epic Moment: For 30 seconds, you gain +30 Ranged Power, you can move while still gaining Archer's Focus stacks, and you do not take the normal 20% damage penalty while using Improved Precise Shot. You also gain 30% Action Boost bonus to Movement Speed for the duration. In addition, your Ranged attacks have a 30% chance to deal 3d100+180 Cold damage and 3d100+180 Light damage which scale with 200% Ranged Power. Finally, your Ranged attacks in this state have a 100% chance to proc Double Rainbow effects. Cooldown: 5 minutes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mass Chaos
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Moment: Enemies in an area are Confused with no save for 30 seconds, gain 1 stack of Fey Chaos, and apply a stack of Fey Chaos on hitting non-Player, non-Hireling targets while Confused. 5 minute cooldown.
Fey Chaos: This creature takes 5% more damage from all sources for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and all stacks expire after not gaining new ones for 10 seconds.
